title: Sorry Rito this is a complaint on ART
body:
Your "artists" are not very good at capturing a real-life image. Simple fact. Do you see the eyebrows on that Blood Moon Diana?

Look really close at the log-in screen. I'm embarrassed. I've noticed many flaws in the art coming from your company and I suggest you balance your art design team with some people who have real experience in make-up.

A certified make-up artist (should) know how to balance a female's facial features for the camera. I highly recommend you get some real designers in your little club.

replies.body:
Your insulting one of the best splashes riot has ever done





And you picked the eyebrows to insullt...

Can you explain the exact issues you have with the eyebrows in detail?

As an artist I can tell that they are not exactly lining up with where the brow should dictate they be, but it doesn't seem distractingly bad though.
